full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS MCHOD KYI CHO GA @007B RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR BSNGA GSAL BA KU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA' DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN GNANG MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS MYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS CES PA SHING MO SPRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SIDDHI PHO BRANG DU SBYAR YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
